text: Hello everybody! We are having some issues uploading a Theme in the marketplace, the Theme listing name is taking the name of the folder where the theme is instead of the label on the `theme.json` . Is there a way to change the Theme listing name without changing the folder name? We want to keep it lowercase and without spaces. Thanks!
Hey Oswaldo, do you have a link to your theme in the Design Manager that i can use for a reference. I will see if I can find anything out on my end for you
Which link can I share with you in the design manager?
